description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
What's Changed
- [Test] Temporarily increase test duration by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1125
- [Test] Skip failing test - requires update by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1130
- Update to latest stable Pytorch by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1126
- Update README.md by @huchenlei in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1132
- Update core to 0.3.30 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1133
- Add toasts for update check by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1134
- [nit] Use structured logging by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1135
- Update ComfyUI 0.3.31 + frontend 1.18.6 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1138
- v0.4.44 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1139
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.4.41...v0.4.44
